summary: Dramatic colors for ENB - Fully compatible with Night Eye spells and all imagespace modifiers!
descriptionHtml:
[center]Welcome to

[size=10][color=yellow]DRAMA ENB[/color][/size]

[img]http://s9.postimage.org/7zd1fuy0f/image.jpg[/img]
[img]http://s10.postimage.org/40ewubtih/image.jpg[/img]
[img]http://s8.postimage.org/4r24jtqo5/image.jpg[/img]
[img]http://s10.postimage.org/v22ncbjmx/image.jpg[/img]
[/center]

- Dramatic color palette
- Fast and quality SSAO
- Fully suitable for midrange PCs
- Dark nights and dungeons
- No high contrasts
- Depth Of Field
- Exterior lighting dramatically depends on weather
- Completely worked from scratch
- Compatible with Night Eyes and all other imagespace modifiers!

[img]http://s8.postimage.org/p4t9f7xad/image.jpg[/img]
[img]http://s18.postimage.org/bhxwoscux/image.jpg[/img]
[img]http://s8.postimage.org/kllm7g4sl/image.jpg[/img]

* RECOMMENDED MODS FOR THIS ENB CONFIG *

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13268]WATER - Water And Terrain Enhancement Redux[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19933]Volrath Enhanced Lights and Fixes[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20100]Sunglare disabler[/url]

* INSTALL *

Download the ENB binaries from ENB site and install files into your Skyrim folder (not data).
Make sure you\'re download the v0.114. Here the [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0114.htm]link[/url].
Download my ENB configuration and install files into your Skyrim folder too and overwrite existing files.

* CREDITS *
Boris Vorontsov who made the ENB - www.enbdev.com
author: MannyGT

files.name: Drama ENB
files.changelogHtml: Imagespace compatibilty added. The night vision will works now
